function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The research involving data collection may involve direct contact with individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the research team and from participants to researchers.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, maintain social distancing, and use personal protective equipment during data collection.","Technologies":"Contactless data collection methods, such as online surveys and virtual interviews, can be used to minimize direct contact.","People":"Research team, participants, and data collectors","Owner":"Research team and research institution"},{"Description":"Quality assurance team assessing deliverables can lead to gatherings and meetings, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the quality assurance team and from external stakeholders to the team.","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual meetings and remote collaboration tools to conduct quality assessments and reviews.","Technologies":"Video conferencing, collaboration software, and project management tools for remote quality assessments.","People":"Quality assurance team, external stakeholders","Owner":"Project management team and quality assurance team"},{"Description":"Industrialist inputs collected through questionnaires may involve physical handling of documents, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the research team and from industrialists to researchers.","Mitigation":"Encourage digital submission of inputs, sanitize physical documents, and limit in-person interactions for data collection.","Technologies":"Digital submission platforms, document scanning and digital archiving, and secure file sharing systems.","People":"Research team, industrialists, and data collectors","Owner":"Research team and research institution"}]}
